analysis.description:
DisbursableToken.claimable (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#286-292) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- DisbursableToken.accounts

MainSale.createTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#446-456) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#452-453)

MainSale.authorizedCreateTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#487-495) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(recipient,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#492-493)

MainSale.finishMinting (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#554-560) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#556-557)

MainSale.retrieveTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-foreignToken.transfer(multisigVault,foreignToken.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol)

DisbursableToken.pointMultiplier should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#257-258)
HeroToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0xaa5857efefa26a16e67c36b7d72590cfaf499cca.sol#356-357)
